LanguageData.CommandAutoRebuildDesc: Automatically rebuild the trap after it is destroyed.
LanguageData.CommandAutoRearmDesc: Automatically designates trap to be rearmed after it is sprung.
LanguageData.CommandRearmDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so that it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.CommandRearmDescDebug: Instantly rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
